includedAssets.title: Alvin And The Chipmunks
includedAssets.synopsis: Three singing chipmunks hit the big time in LA, but will their new-found fame and success make them forget their woodland roots? Family fun with Jason Lee and Justin Long.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Three singing chipmunks hit the big time in LA, but will their new-found fame and success make them forget their woodland roots? Family fun with Jason Lee and Justin Long.

includedAssets.title: Alvin And The Chipmunks: The Squeakquel
includedAssets.synopsis: High-pitched fun as the singing rodents take on feisty female furballs The Chipettes in a Battle of the Bands contest. With Anna Faris and Justin Long.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: High-pitched fun as the singing rodents take on feisty female furballs The Chipettes in a Battle of the Bands. With Anna Faris and Justin Long.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: High-pitched fun as the singing rodents take on feisty female furballs The Chipettes in a Battle of the Bands contest. With Anna Faris and Justin Long.

includedAssets.title: Alvin And The Chipmunks: Chipwrecked
includedAssets.synopsis: On a cruise, the Chipmunks go overboard and are washed up on an island. Can Dave come to their rescue? Kid-friendly fun in this third big-screen adventure.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: On a cruise, the Chipmunks go overboard and are washed up on an island. Can Dave come to their rescue? Kid-friendly fun.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: On a cruise, the Chipmunks go overboard and are washed up on an island. Can Dave come to their rescue? Kid-friendly fun in this third big-screen adventure.

includedAssets.title: Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip
includedAssets.synopsis: In the third squeakquel, Alvin, Simon and Theodore think that Dave (Jason Lee) is going to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami...and dump them. They have three days to get to him and stop the proposal, saving themselves not only from losing Dave but possibly from gaining a terrible step-brother. Prepare for another eardrum-piercing escapade with the rockin' rodents.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Fearing that they might be ditched, Alvin, Simon and Theodore hit the road to prevent long-suffering guardian Dave from proposing to his girlfriend.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the third squeakquel, Alvin, Simon and Theodore think that Dave (Jason Lee) is going to propose to his new girlfriend in Miami...and dump them. They have three days to get to him and stop the proposal, saving themselves not only from losing Dave but possibly from gaining a terrible step-brother. Prepare for another eardrum-piercing escapade with the rockin' rodents.

includedAssets.title: Alvin & The Chipmunks Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Three singing chipmunks deal with their newfound success, take on the feisty Chipettes in a Battle of the Bands contest, try to survive on a desert island and hit the road to try to keep hold of their best friend. Family fun with Jason Lee, Justin Long and Anna Faris.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Three singing chipmunks deal with their newfound fame, compete in the Battle of the Bands, try to escape a desert island and head out on a road trip.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Three singing chipmunks deal with their newfound success, take on the feisty Chipettes in a Battle of the Bands contest, try to survive on a desert island and hit the road to try to keep hold of their best friend. Family fun with Jason Lee, Justin Long and Anna Faris.
